common.description: Essential developer tools, code sharing, forum, and community — all in one platform.

jsonFormatter.title: JSON Formatter
jsonFormatter.description: Format, validate & minify JSON with syntax highlighting
jsonFormatter.inputSubtitle: Paste or type your JSON here

regexTester.title: Regex Tester
regexTester.description: Test regular expressions with real-time match highlighting

base64Encoder.title: Base64 / URL Encoder
base64Encoder.description: Encode & decode Base64 and URL strings instantly

colorConverter.title: Color Converter
colorConverter.description: Convert between HEX, RGB & HSL with palette generation

uuidGenerator.title: UUID & Hash Generator
uuidGenerator.description: Generate UUIDs and compute SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 hashes

jwtDecoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwtDecoder.description: Decode JSON Web Tokens and inspect header, payload & expiry
jwtDecoder.tokenSubtitle: Paste your JSON Web Token below

timestampConverter.title: Timestamp Converter
timestampConverter.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates

loremGenerator.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremGenerator.description: Generate placeholder text in paragraphs, sentences or words
loremGenerator.startClassic: Start with "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..."

hero.title: Developer Tools &
hero.subtitle: 8 essential developer utilities — fast, private, and fully client-side. Plus a growing community for sharing code, solving problems, and connecting with developers worldwide.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Professional developer tools that respect your privacy. All processing happens in your browser.
features.clientSideDesc: No data ever leaves your browser. Your code stays yours.
features.fastDesc: Instant results with zero server round-trips.
features.openDesc: No accounts required for tools. No ads. No tracking.

toolsSection.title: Developer Tools
toolsSection.subtitle: Essential utilities for your daily workflow

settings.profileLoadError: Profile could not be loaded. Try signing out and back in, or contact support if the issue persists.
settings.usernameHint: Lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only.
settings.allowPrivateMessagesHint: Others can message you via Discord when this is on.
settings.connectDiscordHint: Link your Discord to receive messages from other developers.

messages.subtitle: Message other developers via Discord.
messages.noConversationsDesc: Turn on “Allow private messages” in Settings and connect your Discord. Then visit a profile and click Message to open Discord.
messages.noMessages: No messages yet. Send the first one!

feed.subtitle: See what developers you follow are sharing.
feed.filterLabel: Show all or only people you follow
feed.emptyDesc: Follow other developers to see their posts and snippets here.

forum.subtitle: Discussions, questions, and project showcases.
forum.viewSwitcherLabel: Switch between grid and list view
forum.noPosts: No posts yet. Start a discussion!
forum.title: Title
forum.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to reply!
forum.loginToComment: Sign in to leave a comment.
forum.notFoundDesc: This post may have been deleted or doesn't exist.

snippets.title: Code Snippets
snippets.subtitle: Browse and share code snippets with the community.
snippets.noSnippets: No snippets yet. Be the first to share a code snippet!
snippets.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this snippet?
snippets.notFoundDesc: This snippet may have been deleted or doesn't exist.

legal.termsAcceptText: By using CommitCamp you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, do not use the service.
legal.termsServiceText: CommitCamp provides developer tools, code sharing, forum, and community features. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time.
legal.termsUseText: You must use the service lawfully and not abuse, harm, or spam other users. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
legal.termsContactText: For questions about these terms, contact us via the platform or the repository.
legal.privacyCollectText: We collect account data (email, username, profile) when you sign up, and usage data necessary to run the service. Developer tools run in your browser; input is not sent to our servers.
legal.privacyUseText: We use your data to provide the service, authenticate you, and improve the platform. We do not sell your personal data.
legal.privacyDiscordText: If you connect Discord for messaging, we store your Discord user id and username to link your profile. Messaging happens on Discord; we do not store message content.
legal.privacyRightsText: You can access, correct, or delete your data via Settings. You may disconnect Discord at any time.
legal.privacyContactText: For privacy questions, contact us via the platform or the repository.
legal.verifyDesc: This page is used for Discord Linked Roles. Sign in to CommitCamp and complete verification if required by a server.
